column5: OPK if the mkt wants this thing down whats it waiting for Shorts should be adding to their position now not when it is lower what are they waiting on The FREAK has spoken this is garbage I dont understand what could possibly be holding this stock up at all Authorizing more shares yada yada yada etc and all the FREAK spoken wisdom
